snippet: The market pulled back in the face of growing concerns about airline profits and a World Bank prediction of weaker growth.
abstract: Stock market pulls back from record levels after weaker forecast for global growth and growing concerns about airline profits.
lead_paragraph: The market pulled back in the face of growing concerns about airline profits and a World Bank prediction of weaker growth.

headline.main: Retreat From Record Highs After Global Forecast Drops
headline.print_headline: Retreat From Record Highs After Global Forecast Drops
